content: a… appstinence screen resources the anxious generation from a book to a movement there is a hole an emptiness in us all that we strive to fill if it doesn t get filled with something noble and elevated modern society will quickly pump it full of garbage that has been true since the beginning of the age of mass media but the garbage pump got 100 times more powerful in the 2010s it matters what we expose ourselves to jonathan haidt author of the anxious generation
